attributes.action:
CALL A GENERAL ELECTION TODAY (24/06/16)

DAVID CAMERON MUST RESIGN NOW !!!
attributes.background:
The United Kingdom has voted to leave the EU. 

The country has never been more divided and this is down to this Conservative government under David Cameron's leadership.

It's time for David Cameron to resign.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
